DEFAULT SETTINGS CHANGED
Base slots for quality values have been reduced to 0/1/1/2/3, from 1/1/2/3/4.
Note: Even if you had changed them, make sure that the values are still yours.
To view the full update history, visit https://git.io/JfmlW

img:images/170|Configurable accuracy overcapping! Your legendary homing sniper rifle can finally enhance someone's accuracy.
Amounts over 100% have diminishing returns, so normally, accuracy won't become unreasonably high.
